TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResourceExpressionBuilder extends System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder

summary.span: 提供程式碼給頁面剖析器，以指派控制項上的屬性值。

span.span: Provides code to the page parser for assigning property values on a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別建立時所要擷取資源值執行網頁的程式碼。The class creates code to retrieve resource values when the page is executed. 資源檔通常包含特定語言或文化特性的當地語系化資訊。A resource file typically contains information localized for a particular language or culture. 資源運算式的形式`<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>`網頁內。A resource expression takes the form `<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>` within the page. 冒號 （:） 的部分指定的運算式產生器使用，類型和冒號後面的部分表示類別名稱和資源的索引鍵。The part of the expression before the colon (:) designates the type of expression builder to use, and the part after the colon signifies the class name and resource key. 上述運算式會從名為的檔案中擷取下列值`ClassKey.resx`:The preceding expression would retrieve the following value from a file named `ClassKey.resx`: ``` Hello! ``` 當頁面剖析器遇到具有運算式`Resources`前置詞，它會建立的執行個體類別。When the page parser encounters an expression with the `Resources` prefix, it creates an instance of the class. 類別會評估運算式，或產生程式碼以執行頁面時，傳回運算式的值。The class either evaluates the expression or generates code to return a value for the expression when the page is executed. 如果將編譯的頁面中遇到，則運算式物件產生的程式碼，從資源檔擷取指定的值。If the expression is encountered in a page that will be compiled, the object generates code that retrieves the specified value from the resource file. 如果運算式發生在單一頁面將不會編譯，以物件會傳回從資源檔的值剖析頁面時。If the expression is encountered in a page that will not be compiled, the object returns the value from the resource file when the page is parsed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會從資源檔擷取預設貨幣。The following code example retrieves the default currency from a resource file. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 此程式碼會讀取下列值從名為`Financial.resx`App_GlobalResources 目錄中。This code reads the following value from a resource file named `Financial.resx` in the App_GlobalResources directory. ``` US dollars ```

returns.span: 剖析的運算式包含類別名稱和資源索引鍵。

span.span: The parsed expression contains the class name and resource key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當表單的運算式時，會呼叫這個方法`<%$ Resources: someResourceKey %>`發生在使用無編譯功能的網頁。This method is called when an expression of the form `<%$ Resources: someResourceKey %>` is encountered in a page that uses the no-compile feature. 它會擷取適當的值在資源檔中的索引鍵/值配對。It retrieves the appropriate value from a key/value pair in a resource file.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.CodeDom.CodeExpression GetCodeExpression (System.Web.UI.BoundPropertyEntry entry, object parsedData, System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext context);

summary.span: 傳回要在頁面執行期間評估的程式碼運算式。

span.span: Returns a code expression to evaluate during page execution.
A that invokes a method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網頁或控制項 CodeDOM 建立期間呼叫這個方法。This method is called during the CodeDOM creation for a page or control. 傳回物件的類型是和表示頁面執行期間擷取資源的值時要呼叫的方法。The object returned is of the type and represents the method to call when retrieving a resource value during page execution.

summary.span: 傳回物件，表示剖析的運算式。

span.span: Returns an object that represents the parsed expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會剖析運算式，並傳回和屬性值在傳回物件，如果運算式中有提供這些屬性。This method parses the expression and returns a and a property value in the returned object, if these properties are provided in the expression.

span.span: The resource expression cannot be found or is invalid.

Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SupportsEvaluate As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SupportsEvaluate { bool get(); };

summary.span: 傳回值，指出是否可在使用無編譯功能的頁面中評估運算式。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated in a page that uses the no-compile feature.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否方法已經在類別中實作。The property indicates whether the method has been implemented in the class. 必須實作內運算式產生器，因為運算式評估中使用無編譯功能的網頁。 must be implemented within an expression builder for an expression to be evaluated in a page that uses the no-compile feature. 在未編譯的頁面中，支援的資源值評估，因此這個屬性永遠傳回`true`。 supports evaluation of resource values in non-compiled pages, so this property always returns `true`.
